string.text: Produced by a well known Canadian tobacco company, these were smuggled into the Zone by a suspicious group of people from the 'Cult of Narodnaya Solyanka', which appeared inside the perimeter around 2010. Experienced Stalkers know that this detrimental habit from outside the Exclusion Zone can be even more dangerous inside, where they've had to stop using them in order to evade bloodsuckers, boars and everything else the Zone can throw at them...
